footer.description: Sura isi na Exodus: Umufatanya bikorwa

about.quote1: Ikigo OLD Fox gitegura ingendo nyobokamana, kigafasha abantu ku giti cyabo n’amatsinda gusura ahantu hatagatifu ku isi hose. Ingendo zacu zigamije gufasha abantu gukura mu mwuka,Gusenga, kwiyumvamo no gusobanukirwa umuco. Dufasha gusura insengero za kera cyangwa imijyi mitagatifu, buri rugendo ruhuza  ruhuza abagenzi n’ukwemera kwabo n’imico yabo. Twitondera gutegura buri rugendo kugira ngo ubuzima bw’abagenzi bugende neza kandi bubashimishe.
about.quote2: Ibyerekezo byacu bitanga uburambe bwo guhindura, buhuza iterambere ry'umwuka n'ubusabane bw'umuco. Abagenzi basura ibice by'ingenzi by'iyobokamana, bagahura n'imigenzo y'aho, kandi bakahuza n'abandi bemera. Izi ngendo zishyigikira gusubira mu mwuka no kwibuka, zitanga ubushobozi bwo gusobanukirwa cyane n'iyobokamana no kubika ibihe bitazibagirana mu bice bimwe mu byaha by'ingenzi ku isi.

destinations.rwandaDescription: Menya umurage w'idini w'u Rwanda, uhuza umuco n'umwuka.
destinations.israelDescription: Menya  umurage ukungahaye wo mu mwuka wa Isiraheli n'ibiranga ahera.
destinations.turkeyDescription: Menya ahantu hera muri Turukiya, ihuriro ry'amadini ya kera.
destinations.egyptDescription: Menya ibitangaza byo mu mwuka bya Misiri hamwe n'insengero za kera.

service.title: Serivisi
service.subtitle: Serivisi Dutanga
service.description: Subiza amaso ku bimenyetso bitandukanye by’amadini no ku mibereho y’umwuka, bigaragaza umuco ukungahaye n’imigenzo gakondo. Suzuma insengero zera, za kiliziya za kera, n’amahema y’itorero arangwa n’amahoro, buri kimwe gifite inkuru z’imihango ya kera n’ukwizera gukomeye. Ujye mu minsi mikuru n’imigenzo y’umwuka ihuza abantu, ikwereke neza urugendo rw’ubumwe n’ukwemera abatuye isi bose bahuriyeho.

products.title: Ibicuruzwa
products.subtitle: Ibicuruzwa by'Amateka
products.discription: Sura biro yacu kugirango ugure ibicuruzwa by'idini bifite ireme mu buryo bwa hafi.

Turkeydetails.name: Izina
Turkeydetails.turkeyDescription: Menya umurage w'idini muri Turukiya: sura Hagia Sophia ya Istanbul, Umusigiti w'Ubururu, Kiliziya ya Mutagatifu Yohani i Efeso, n'amazu y'amasengesho ya kera yo muri Cappadocia kugira ngo wiyongere mu by'umwuka.
Turkeydetails.turkeyDetailedDescription:
Tangira urugendo ruhanga amaso muri Turukiya, igihugu gifite amateka menshi y'idini. Tangirira i Istanbul, aho Iburasirazuba buhura n'Iburengerazuba. Sura Hagia Sophia y'igitangaza, yari katedarali n'umusigiti, ubu ni inzu ndangamurage, yerekana ubwubatsi bwiza bwa Byzantine. Rambagira Umusigiti w'Ubururu, uzwi cyane kubera amakaro yabwo y'ubururu n'ingoro zayo zitangaje.

Nyuma, jya i Cappadocia, izwi cyane kubera imisozi yayo idasanzwe n'amazu y'amasengesho ya kera yuzuye amashusho meza. Menya Inzu Ndangamurage ya Goreme, aho UNESCO yita Umurage w'Isi.

Genda i Efeso, aho ushobora gusura Kiliziya ya Mutagatifu Yohani n'ibishingwe by'umujyi wa kera, bigaragaza uruhare rw'Ubukristo bwa mbere.

Ubusoza, sura Pamukkale, izwi cyane kubera imisozi yayo y'amazi n'ibishingwe bya kera bya Hierapolis, bizwi cyane kubera amazi yayo ashyushye.
Turkeydetails.clickUseMap: Kanda Koresha ikarita kugira ngo ukurikirane aho hantu

kibeho.name: Kibeho
kibeho.description: Hazwi kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya, hakurura abashaka kwiyunga mu by'umwuka.

musanze.name: Musanze
musanze.description: Sura amatorero yo mu gace kandi wige amateka y'ukwemera muri aka gace.

lakeKivu.name: Ikiyaga cya Kivu
lakeKivu.description: Ahantu heza ho gutekereza, aho ushobora kunezererwa n'amahoro yo ku nkombe zacyo.

kigaliMemorial.name: Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali
kigaliMemorial.description: Ahantu hatanga isomo ku mateka y'u Rwanda, hagatanga ubutumwa bw'imbabazi no kwiyunga.

rwandaDetails.kibehoDescription: Kibeho, iherereye mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, mu Rwanda, ni igihugu cyera kizwi cyane kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya, gikurura abashaka kwiyunga mu by'umwuka baje kureba imisozi myiza n'umuco mwiza.
rwandaDetails.tourDetails:
Uzagira urugendo ruhindura ubuzima mu Rwanda usura ahantu hera. Uzatangirira urugendo rwawe i Kibeho, hazwi kubera ibonekerwa rya Bikira Mariya byatangajwe, bikurura ibihumbi by'abakristu buri mwaka. Ahantu hatekanye n'imisozi myiza bitanga uburyo bwiza bwo gutekereza no gusenga.

Nyuma, uzajya i Musanze, aho abamisiyoneri ba mbere bashyizeho urufatiro rw'Ubukristo mu gace. Sura amatorero yo mu gace kandi wige amateka y'ukwemera muri aka gace.

Ntuzibagirwe gusura Ikiyaga cya Kivu, ahantu heza ho gutekereza, aho ushobora kunezererwa n'amahoro yo ku nkombe zacyo.

Ubusoza, sura Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, ahantu hatanga isomo ku mateka y'u Rwanda, hagatanga ubutumwa bw'imbabazi no kwiyunga biri mu mizi y'inyigisho za Gikristo.

Mu rugendo rwawe rwose, uzabana n'umuco w'Abanyarwanda wakira neza, uzarye ibiryo by'umuco kandi wishimire imisozi myiza, bityo urugendo rwawe rw'idini ruzaba ruhebuje kandi rudahindurika.
rwandaDetails.clickUseMap: Kanda Koresha ikarita kugira ngo ukurikirane aho hantu

egyptDetails.cairoDescription: Menya umurage w'Abamisiri: sura Piramide Nkuru, insengero za kera, imisigiti ya Kisilamu, Umusozi Sinayi, n'amasoko arangwa n'ubuzima bwinshi kugira ngo ubone uko amateka n'umuco bihuriye hamwe.
egyptDetails.egyptDescription: Tangira urugendo rw'umwuka muri Misiri, igihugu gikize mu mateka y'idini. Tangirira urugendo rwawe i Kayiro, aho ushobora gusura Piramide Nkuru za Giza na Sfingi, ibimenyetso by'ubwami bwa Misiri ya kera. Rambagira Kayiro ya Kisilamu, aho hari imisigiti irangwa n'ubwiza nka Al-Azhar Mosque na Sultan Hassan Mosque, bigaragaza umurage wa Kisilamu w'igihugu. Nyuma, jya i Luxor, izwi nk'inzu ndangamurage nkuru y'isi. Sura urusengero rwa Karnak n'Ikibaya cy'Abami, aho abami benshi bahambwe. Ntuzibagirwe Umusozi Sinayi, aho bizeye ko Mose yahawe Amategeko Icumi, n'Urusengero rwa Mutagatifu Katerina, aho UNESCO yita Umurage w'Isi. Soza urugendo rwawe muri Alexandria, usura Imva za Kom el Shoqafa n'Igihome cya Qaitbay, bitanga isura ku mateka y'Ubukristo n'Ubuyisilamu by'umugi. Ishimire ibiryo by'aho n'umuco urangwa n'ubuzima bwinshi mu rugendo rwawe rwose.

cairo.name: Kayiro
cairo.description: Sura Piramide Nkuru za Giza, Sfingi, kandi urambagire Kayiro ya Kisilamu ifite imisigiti irangwa n'ubwiza.

luxor.name: Luxor
luxor.description: Rambagira inzu ndangamurage nkuru y'isi, harimo n'urusengero rwa Karnak n'Ikibaya cy'Abami.

mountSinai.name: Umusozi Sinayi
mountSinai.description: Sura ahantu hizwe ko Mose yahawe Amategeko Icumi kandi urambagire Urusengero rwa Mutagatifu Katerina.

alexandria.name: Alexandria
alexandria.description: Menya Imva za Kom el Shoqafa n'Igihome cya Qaitbay, bitanga isura ku mateka y'umugi akize.

egyptDetails.clickUseMap: Kanda Koresha ikarita kugira ngo ukurikirane aho hantu

jerusalemDetails.telAvivDescription: Sura Isirayeli kugira ngo urebe amateka yayo: ahantu hera ha Yerusalemu, imisozi ya Dead Sea, n'imigi ikomeye nka Tel Aviv na Hayifa irakutegereje.
jerusalemDetails.israelDescription:
Tangira urugendo rw'umwuka muri Isirayeli, umutima w'amadini atatu akomeye ku isi. Tangirira i Yerusalemu, usura Urukuta rw'Iburengerazuba, igisigaye cya nyuma cy'Urusengero rwa Kabiri, n'Ingoro ya Rock, urusengero rwa Isilamu ruzwi cyane. Rambagira Kiliziya y'Imva Ntagatifu, yizwe ko ari aho Yesu yabambwe kandi akazuka.

Nyuma, jya i Betelehemu, aho ushobora gusura Kiliziya y'Ivuka, yerekana aho Yesu yavukiye.

Jya i Nazareti kureba Kiliziya y'Ivuka, ahantu h'ingenzi h'urugendo rw'Abakristo.

Ntuzibagirwe ubwiza bw'amahoro bw'Inyanja ya Galilaya, aho ushobora gutekereza ku nkuru za Bibiliya.

Ubusoza, ruhuka ku Nyanja y'Umunyu, ahantu hepfo kurusha ahandi ku isi, hazwi kubera imbaraga zaho zo gukiza. Ishimire ibiryo by'aho n'umuco urangwa n'ubuzima bwinshi, bityo urugendo rwawe rw'umwuka muri Isirayeli ruzaba ruhebuje kandi rudahindurika.

jerusalem.name: Yerusalemu
jerusalem.description: Rambagira ahantu hera nk'Urukuta rw'Iburengerazuba, Ingoro ya Rock, na Kiliziya y'Imva Ntagatifu.

bethlehem.name: Betelehemu
bethlehem.description: Sura Kiliziya y'Ivuka, yerekana aho Yesu yavukiye.

nazareth.name: Nazareti
nazareth.description: Reba Kiliziya y'Ivuka, ahantu h'ingenzi h'urugendo rw'Abakristo.

seaOfGalilee.name: Inyanja ya Galilaya
seaOfGalilee.description: Tekereza ku nkuru za Bibiliya kuri aho hantu h'amahoro.

deadSea.name: Inyanja y'Umunyu
deadSea.description: Ishimire ahantu hepfo kurusha ahandi ku isi, hazwi kubera imbaraga zaho zo gukiza.
